General.Name: Shaanxi Aerospace Power Hi-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Aerospace Power Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. manufactures and services special equipment in China. The company offers fire, mine and oilfield, fuel delivery, petrol-feed, and large water pumps; hydraulic turbines and motors; torque converters; gas and flow meters, flowmeter skid-mounted systems, and intelligent gas solutions; and reaction equipment, crystallizers, and filter presses. Its products are primarily used in petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, transportation, energy, engineering machinery, public service, military, etc. industries. The company also exports its products. Shaanxi Aerospace Power Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Xi'an, China.
